Play:
Gonza the Lancer
(Yari no Gonza kasane katabira / 鑓の権三重帷子)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1717

Reference: Major Plays of Chikamatsu, translated by Donald Keene, (New York: Columbia University Press, 1961); Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku February 1983 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

July 1971: Gonza the Lancer

February 1978: Gonza the Lancer

February 1983: Gonza the Lancer

July 1983: Gonza the Lancer

February 1991: Gonza the Lancer

November 1990: Gonza the Lancer

August 1995: Gonza the Lancer

Characters:

Gonza (Sasano Gonza / 笹野権三)

Oyuki (Musume Oyuki / 娘お雪)

Oyuki's governess (Oyuki no uba / お雪の乳母)

Bannojo (Kawazura Bannojō / 川側伴之丞)

Chutabei (Iwaki Chūtabei / 岩木忠太兵衛)

Osai (Osai / おさゐ)

Kakusuke, a servant (Yakko Kakusuke / 奴角助)

Torajiro, Osai's son (Segare Torajirō / 伜虎次郎)

Okiku, Osai's daughter (Musume Okiku / 娘お菊)

Man, a maid (Gejo Man / 下女まん)

Osugi, a maid (Gejo Osugi / 下女お杉)

Namisuke, a servant (Genin Namisuke / 下人(仲間,奴)浪介)

Ichinoshin (Asaka Ichinoshin / 浅香市之進)

Osai's mother (Osai haha / おさゐ母 )

Osute (Musume Osute / 娘お捨)

Jimbei (Iwaki Jinbei / 岩木甚平 )

Dancer (Odoriko / 踊り子)

Jinnai, a servant (Yakko Jinnai / 奴甚内)

Servants (Yakko / 奴)

Retainer (Wakatō / 若党)

Servants (Chūgen / 仲間)
